msg: JPEG files now have X/YDensity set according to -dpi option.

author: nsochele
msg: This implementation concerns SVGPointList for <polygon> and <polyline>, SVGPathSegList for <path>, SVGTransform list for all graphical elements, and SVGLengthList for textual elements.
